decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FDC/16/12/01A, FDC/16/12/03A, FDC/16/12/04 Received: 10 June 2016 FDC/16/12/02B, FDC/16/12/01B Received: 27 July 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for barber's shop (A1) and tattoo parlour (Sui Generis) and for no other purpose (including any other Sui Generis purpose in of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 2015 (as amended), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted for a barber's shop (A1) and tattoo parlour (Sui Generis) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times; Monday to Friday 09:00-19:00, Saturdays 09:00-18:00, Sundays and Bank Holidays 10:00 - 16:00.
description: Change of use of the ground floor to part  A1 shop and part sui generis (Tattoo parlour)
